item.title: Changing the Color for Evolution New Message
item.description: Today I decided to fix one thing that annoyed me, and that was the new email color for the evolution mail client when it’s using the dark mode. After some reading found this, and voilà, it worked :) So here’s the snippet I used on the file ~/.config/gtk-3.0/gtk.css: MessageList,* { -MessageList-new-mail-fg-color: darkblue; } Awesome \o/
